languages.text: "Мы хотели видеть. Наблюдать. Сознавать. Говорить". {n}Сервитор делает странное волнообразное движение руками, одновременно очень человечное и совершенно нечеловеческое.{/n} "Мы хотим говорить с тобой! Ты будешь говорить с нами?"

traits.locale_text: "Мы попросили об этом. Мы хотели видеть. Наблюдать. Сознавать. Говорить". {n}Сервитор делает странное волнообразное движение руками, одновременно очень человечное и совершенно нечеловеческое.{/n} "Мы хотим говорить с тобой! Ты будешь говорить с нами?"

languages.text: "We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"
languages.original_text: "Мы хотели видеть. Наблюдать. Сознавать. Говорить". {n}Сервитор делает странное волнообразное движение руками, одновременно очень человечное и совершенно нечеловеческое.{/n} "Мы хотим говорить с тобой! Ты будешь говорить с нами?"

traits.locale_text: "We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

"We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

"We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

"We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

"We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

languages.text: « Nous voulions voir. Observer. Apprendre. Parler. » {n}Le servitor effectue un geste ample et étrange de la main qui semble à la fois très humain et... totalement inhumain !{/n} « Nous voulons vous parler. Acceptez-vous de nous parler ? »
languages.original_text: "We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous voulions voir. Observer. Apprendre. Parler. » {n}Le servitor effectue un geste ample et étrange de la main qui semble à la fois très humain et... totalement inhumain !{/n} « Nous voulons vous parler. Acceptez-vous de nous parler ? »

languages.text: “我们想观察，认知，阐述。”{n}机仆用手做了个古怪的波浪状手势，看起来很像人类的举动，但又与人类的习惯相差甚远。{/n}“我们想和你谈谈！你愿意和我们谈谈吗？”
languages.original_text: "We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

traits.locale_text: “我们想观察，认知，阐述。”{n}奴工用手做了个古怪的波浪状手势，看起来很像人类的举动，但又与人类的习惯相差甚远。{/n}“我们想和你谈谈！你愿意和我们谈谈吗？”

languages.text: "Wir wollten sehen. Beobachten. Erkennen. Sprechen." {n}Der Servitor führt eine merkwürdige, wellenartige Geste mit seinen Händen aus, die gleichzeitig äußerst menschlich und alles andere als menschlich aussieht.{/n} "Wir wollen mit Euch sprechen! Werdet Ihr mit uns sprechen?"
languages.original_text: "We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir wollten sehen. Beobachten. Erkennen. Sprechen." {n}Der Servitor führt eine merkwürdige, wellenartige Geste mit seinen Händen aus, die gleichzeitig äußerst menschlich und alles andere als menschlich aussieht.{/n} "Wir wollen mit Euch sprechen! Werdet Ihr mit uns sprechen?"

languages.text: «Queríamos ver. Observar. Conocer. Hablar». {n}El servidor hace un extraño gesto de saludo con las manos que resulta a la vez muy humano y lejos de parecer humano.{/n} «¡Queremos hablar contigo! ¿Te importaría hablar con nosotros?».
languages.original_text: "We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

traits.locale_text: «Queríamos ver. Observar. Conocer. Hablar». {n}El servidor hace un extraño gesto de saludo con las manos que resulta a la vez muy humano y lejos de parecer humano.{/n} «¡Queremos hablar contigo! ¿Te importaría hablar con nosotros?».

languages.text: 「見て、観察して、認識して、話すことを望んだ」{n}サーヴィターは両手で奇妙に波打つような仕草を見せた。非常に人間臭いような、同時に明らかに人間離れしているような動きだった。{/n}「あなたと話したい！我々と話してくれるか？」
languages.original_text: "We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

traits.locale_text: 「見て、観察して、認識して、話すことを望んだ」{n}サーヴィターは両手で奇妙に波打つような仕草を見せた。非常に人間臭いような、同時に明らかに人間離れしているような動きだった。{/n}「あなたと話したい！我々と話してくれるか？」

languages.text: "Görmek istedik. Gözlemlemek... Bilişmek... Konuşmak..." {n}Hizmetör, elleriyle hem çok insani ve hem de insaniyetten tümüyle uzak görünen, garip, dalgalı bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Sizinle konuşmak istiyoruz! Bizimle konuşacak mısınız?"
languages.original_text: "We wanted to see. Observe. Cognise. Speak." {n}The servitor makes a strange, wavy gesture with its hands that looks at once very human and far from anything human.{/n} "We want to speak with you! Will you speak with us?"

traits.locale_text: "Görmek istedik. Gözlemlemek... Bilişmek... Konuşmak..." {n}Servitör, elleriyle hem çok insani ve hem de insaniyetten tümüyle uzak görünen garip, dalgalı bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Sizinle konuşmak istiyoruz! Bizimle konuşacak mısınız?"
